rules.name: Is_Opp_on_Ready_for_Verification
rules.label: Is Opp on Ready for Verification

Flow.description:
DB: 23 july
Flow Description: Add/Activate/Deactivate Pre-Approval Applicants and is launched from the Wrap Up Opportunity H2 flow
Front-End Access: Work Opportunity button on the Opportunity page.
Flow.label: Manage Applicants

fields.name: displayInstru
fields.fieldText:
• The main applicant cannot be deactivated.
  • A maximum of one Co Applicant is permitted on a Pre-Approval.
  • If the marital agreement of the main applicant is Married in Community of Property, a Co Applicant is mandatory and cannot be deactivated.

fields.name: verificationMsg
fields.fieldText: Before assigning for verification, please ensure that the Co Applicant information is in order:

fields.name: coAppInactiveErr
fields.fieldText:
The Co Applicant is marked as Inactive.

To run Consent, IDV and Credit check the Co Applicant must be Activated by clicking on Manage Applicants.

fields.name: consentComplete
fields.fieldText:
Consent, IDV and Credit Check completed.


Current Co Applicant Status:

fields.name: assignVerBlockCo
fields.fieldText:
The Co Applicant must be progressed to Awaiting Verification in order to Assign for Verification.


Alternatively, the Co Applicant can be deactivated by clicking on Manage Applicants if the marital agreement is not Married (In Community of Property).

fields.name: addOrDeactivate
fields.fieldText:
Add or Deactivate a Co-Applicant?:

(If the marital agreement is not Married COP, you are able to deactivate the Co-Applicant)
